title: (x) Looking for Le Corbusier stencil font - Le Corbusier {Benjamin}
content:
I've been looking for a Neutraface stencil font. House Industries did a refresh of this typeface but does not include a stencil version. Was one ever made? I was told there was but have not been able to locate it. Apparently, architects favor these stencils and often use the number stencil set on their plans.

If anyone could point me in a direction, it'd be greatly appreciated.

Cheers
author: Mr Nibs

comments.content:
Apparently I've got my architects mixed up again. no wonder I can't find it. It's Carbusier not Richard Neutra. My bad. Go back to doing more important things now. :)

Cheers
